s:patient presents with 6 weeks history of mild sudden onset of chest pain, mild left le pain and swelling and mild shortness of breath. pt is a m aged 41 ys. Patient is a moderate drinker he denies smoking o:Height 68 in, Weight 201 lbs, Temperature 97.8 F, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15 a:Deep Venous Thrombosis p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed warfarin - 5 mg daily, and ordered D-dimer, PT, PTT.
